Posts.Content: Just finished my treatments last month with Taxatere. Was fortunate, main problem I had with it was major enhancement of radiation - hurt to swallow, VERY acid stomach. Had to finally take Prevacid for my stomach, but pretty much gone now. Not much appetite. Just remember there is light at the end of the tunnel. My thoughts and prayers are with you. Good Luck!
Posts.Title: It's Scary Out Here Isn't It?
